scripts.release-linux-ia32: node-pre-gyp rebuild --target_arch=ia32 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --target_platform=linux --runtime=electron --target=3.0.0 && node-pre-gyp --target_arch=ia32 --target_platform=linux --runtime=electron --target=3.0.0 package && node-pre-gyp-github publish --release
scripts.release-linux: node-pre-gyp rebuild --target_arch=x64 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --runtime=electron --target=3.0.0 --target_platform=linux && node-pre-gyp package --target_arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --runtime=electron --target=3.0.0 && node-pre-gyp-github publish --release
scripts.release: node-pre-gyp rebuild --runtime=electron --target=3.0.0 && node-pre-gyp package --runtime=electron --target=3.0.0 && node-pre-gyp-github publish --release
